website_summaries.verdict: If you’re on the fence about picking the right style for a special child, this is a good bet. For the most part, loom bands are loved by kids of all ages and genders, and this particular kit is one of the best on the market.
pros: High-quality tools with rubber bands that are sturdier than most similar kits
Comes with 600 rubber bands, offering ring- and bracelet-making opportunities that should last a while
cons: First-time users may encounter a slight learning curve

customer_reviews.title: Not what's pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy...first of all the box shows black and blue bands which we wanted specifically...there were none. Secondly three of the pegs were broken off so the loom cant be used at all! The colors that are in the box look nothing like the bright colors on the box, they are dull and ugly.
customer_reviews.author: LinAmazon

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this. They got it for Christmas and still ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. They got it for Christmas and still use it all the time. I will say that the rubber bands are a little cheap. I think it would work better with higher quality rubber bands. Overall, though, a great gift for kids ages 5-10.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I recommend purchasing additional bands to keep you or your child ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this, I recommend purchasing additional bands to keep you or your child occupied for longer, as the quantity and selection included is limited, but it comes with everything you need to get started!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived completely broken in half. Not sure if it was shipped like that or not, but it was really upsetting. My kiddo was able to use the rubber bands and find a way to make them on YouTube with out the plastic piece. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Will Make A Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece really likes making bracelets, so I was excited to find this. I am always looking for something different, and unique, to give as a gift, and this fit the bill. I will be storing this away to give her as a Christmas gift, and I know she will be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry making kit for a young girl!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old is obsessed with making these bracelets. This kit includes the loom. Your child can make them with the loom, or they can be made directly on their fingers. A variety of colors of rubber bands are included in this kit. Includes the s connectors. Overall this is a great starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Lobdin

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age person
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my cousin years ago and she made me a colorful bracelet which I still have. I ordered one myself and have already made 4-5 bracelets. The ibstructions are very confusing and not for beginners, best to consult youtube
customer_reviews.author: Beanybabe

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loved this. He has made bracelets for everyone and is very proud of himself.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for someone. The box was not opened. The seal was intact. This package is missing the hook and bag of clasp. There is no option to return as it was purchased in August.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Rastatter

customer_reviews.title: WRONG RUBBER BANDS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The loom is fine but the rubber bands that came with it are the wrong type. They are thick and sticky and impossible to deal with. They are not the right type to make bracelets. The bands that came with my other set are smooth and slide easily as you weave them.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Fun for ages 5 and up..........as long as you supervise
customer_reviews.text: This loom really keeps my 5 1/2 year old granddaughter occupied. I have to help her with it by doing the looping, but I let her put the rubber bands on the loom and decide which colors go where. The most complex ones we've done are the ladder bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun gift but it was hard to figure out how to start and end the bracelet. Also confusing how to make the bracelet it longer. It was fun for my 7 year old and overall worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie04

customer_reviews.title: Fun and creative!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my niece and she can’t stop talking about how much she loves it! She has been watching video is to make more creative patterns too.
customer_reviews.author: nd23

customer_reviews.title: The girl I bought it for was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Kinship Mentor and I bought it for my little gal I mentor. She was thrilled to get it and really enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Elsenpeter

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Has a lot of bands with it and really cute colors. She had a hard time understanding the directions but once I showed her how to do it she was fine..
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Urban

customer_reviews.title: Great craft for indoors during this COVID crisis
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great for being on lockdown. My 6yo grandson loves it. I even bought for my neighbor kids. They Are 10 and 7
customer_reviews.author: christine ellery

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Loom is great for those rainy days or the weekend night all of her friends are busy.
customer_reviews.text: My eleven year old daughter loves this. The whole family received bracelets. Easy to follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Perks

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for tween
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 13 year old. My 6 year old got frustrated and confused. Definatley for a tween.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Benson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute/fun activity!
customer_reviews.text: Ended up getting this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it! Fun activity to do with her on cold/ rainy days! May need to help your child depending on their age but worth buying for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Abella

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my 9 yr old niece and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: C Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this after using them at school. She loves it and it is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun bracelet kit
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old loves to make bracelets with this kit. Comes with a instruction booklet with different design options.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this easy to use. My son ended up still using his fingers to make these bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: breathelifejcs

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with instructions. My ten year old daughter was excited to make sone of the more intricate bracelets, but there’s no instructions on how to remove them from the loom. No real luck on YouTube either.
customer_reviews.author: KBSW

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit, but could use more bands.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great starter kit for rubber band jewelry for my 9 year old. She quickly ran out of rubber bands though. My one critique is that you should double the amount of rubber bands contained in the package. It's not as if there's not room in the box for more.
customer_reviews.author: John Eric Poss

customer_reviews.title: Complicated but good.
customer_reviews.text: Was really hard for the kids to understand how to use the loom. Quality products but needs better directions.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money and too complicated
customer_reviews.text: My kids like to make bracelets but found it more complicated using the tool that cane with it compared to just using their fingers. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: But it so it will shut them for now
customer_reviews.text: Value for money starts is ten my daughter wouldn’t stfu about this thank she occupied now Jesus lol
customer_reviews.author: William Henley

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use after a few tries
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of tries to get used to but after that easy to use and made cute bracelets! My kid loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Took me some time to understand how to braid the rubber bands but my daughter enjoys it and has made dozens of bracelets and chokers with this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for children

customer_reviews.title: It's a Keeper!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Granddaughter, read the instructions, I know,she will spend a lot of time making bracelets for her n friends.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Christmas

customer_reviews.title: I have had a lot of fun with the wonder loom I was making things all ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of fun with the wonder loom I was making things all the time. Then I got busy with other stuff but I still go back with making the bracelets once and awhile. I just like to try things out.
customer_reviews.author: reader lady

customer_reviews.title: Kids can do this on their own
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves this. She was able to open the box and follow instructions on her own. Her friends all have bracelets.

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone..
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She made me lots of arm bands..

customer_reviews.title: Use caution when using them
customer_reviews.text: I don't think "that" highly about rubber band like things because for one thing, I was shot in the eye in the eighth grade with a rubber band. fortunately, it did no damage to my eye. Other than that, this was also a gift for some one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Hook snapped
customer_reviews.text: The bands and loom work great but on the second bracelet the hook snapped and now I have no hook to complete my bracelet.

customer_reviews.title: need to be crafty
customer_reviews.text: Following instruction makes this some what easy Once you figure it out- it is fun - make a lot of bracelets.

customer_reviews.title: It’s is exactly what the description says!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 12 year old daughter who uses it at least once a day. It seems to be relaxing for her and she makes bracelets for everyone.

customer_reviews.title: fun

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purposes.

customer_reviews.text: The directions included for the triple single bracelet were not accurate. My child and I tried several times to make it with no success. We were able to make the bracelet easily after we found a very helpful YouTube video.

customer_reviews.title: Like the item but don't buy it from The Beadery
customer_reviews.text: Waaay too expensive and overpriced. I bought this out of desperation because it was on my childs xmas list but it's much cheaper at walmart or you kind find similar items at many retail locations!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Autism approved in my house for hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My autistic son needed fiddle toys and honestly these worked like a charm. Made him able to work with and manipulate his creations so much easier. I am blessed he does not put things in his mouth so finding these bands were a part of our blessings. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Not just for girls!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was for my 5 year old, and he and his 8 year brother are having a BLAST making bracelets for friends and family. Per other reviews, I bought a refill of bands at the same time of this purchase, so the fun has been able to continue with a lot of variety. The instructions are a tad tricky to follow, but they've been able to follow youtube tutorials with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old granddaughter has been very busy making all sorts of bracelets. We did order a separate kit with lots of extra rubber bands and charms ... so the possibilities are endless and will keep her busy for a long time make bracelets for her friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Speltz

customer_reviews.title: If you need the loom buy your own bands separately
customer_reviews.text: Would love to give it more stars. Gifted this and the bands broke so easily the poor child couldn’t understand what she was doing wrong when she was following the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Tmlewis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT but needs more C-Clips!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11YO LOVES this. My complaint is that it should include more than 24 C clips!!! It has tons of rubber bands, but he can only make 24 bracelets with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Great craft gift....not for younger kids. I don't recommend if you have small kids in house. (Aa small bands are a big chocking hazard if they come loose)

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for crafty kid

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect. I ordered this because my 12 year old was using one in therapy after surgery and helped her to focus on it vs pt.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these but included instructions not good
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these but we couldn't follow along with the instruction. Luckily there's YouTube! Once we watch the YouTube video, my kids were off and running with their imagination.. This $13.00 toy kept the kids entertain and build their creativity skills. But be prepared to buy refills, but they're inexpensive.

customer_reviews.title: Great once you get the hang of it.

product_meta.title: Wonder Loom: the Ultimate Loom for Making Rubber Band Bracelets
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionBEADERY-Wonder Loom Bracelet Making Kit. The ultimate loom for making rubber band bracelets! This package contains one wonder loom; one pick tool; 600 latex free rubber bands; twenty-four C clips and easy to follow instructions. Made in USA.
feature_bullets: The ultimate loom for making rubber band bracelets
One pick tool; 600 latex free rubber bands; twenty-four C clips and easy to follow instructions

specifications.Included Components: Pick tool, 600 latex-free rubber bands, Wonder Loom, 24 "C" clips, Easy to follow instructions
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,135 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
